poemsDataJson.list_full: 難波潟(なにはがた) みじかき芦(あし)の ふしの間(ま)も 逢(あ)はでこの世(よ)を 過(す)ぐしてよとや
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Even for a time//Short as a piece of the reeds//In Naniwa's marsh,//We must never meet again://Is this what you are asking me?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Naniwa-gata|Mijikaki ashi no|Fushi no ma mo|Awade kono yo o|Sugushi teyo to ya
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: あはてこのよを すくしてよとや
poemsDataJson.author: 伊勢(いせ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 訪れて来ない男をなじる恨みと嘆きの心
